name: naath-archive-monorepo
description: Naath Archive monorepo: Next.js web + NestJS API

scripts.build: npm run -w apps/web build && npm run -w apps/api build
scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,api -c blue,magenta "npm run -w apps/web dev" "npm run -w apps/api start:dev"
scripts.lint: npm run -w apps/web lint && npm run -w apps/api lint
scripts.typecheck: npm run -w apps/web typecheck && npm run -w apps/api typecheck
